Headline: Normal Blue Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays after an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Clark/Lake and Cumberland. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays after an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Clark/Lake and Cumberland. Service is resuming.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark due to a street blockage at Wrigley Field.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark due to a street blockage at Wrigley Field.

Allow extra travel time.
